name: Sores and Sorcery
description:
You're a sorcerer who's trying to get through a death run maze created by an evil warlock. You've blessed yourself with eternal rebirth, but you'll have to learn from your past selves as you try to escape the maze to take revenge on the warlock.

Controls:
WASD/Arrow controls with the space bar to jump.
